Name: El Mercado
Description: An Austin staple for decades, El Mercado is dedicated to serving delicious, authentic Tex-Mex cuisine in a warm and vibrant atmosphere!
Hours: Monday 5PM TO 9PM, Tuesday - Thursday 11am to 9pm, Friday & Saturday 11am to 10pm, Sunday 11am to 9pm

Name: El Alma
Description: El Alma's menu is a vibrant take on the contemporary flavors of Mexico, that also features local ingredients like redfish, lamb, and texas quail.

Name: Bouldin Creek Cafe
Description: A local woman-owned vegan/vegetarian restaurant that serves food from scratch and handcrafted coffee drinks.
Hours: Fri, Sat 8:00 AM - 11:00 PM; Sun, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thur 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM

Name: Güero’s Taco Bar
Description: Güero’s Taco Bar is a vibrant part of South Austin, where the locals flock for hand-shaken margaritas made in the original way with fresh-squeezed lime juice.
